description.narrative: Public duty bearers for education at provincial and district levels, with strengthened capacity, are delivering child friendly schooling to the most disadvantaged children.

sector.narrative: Provision of parental education for school readiness (including in temporary learning spaces)
Provision or procurement of primary education learning materials

title.narrative: Pakistan United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Programmes in Pakistan (Emergencies Disaster Risk Reduction)
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2019 Pakistan: Reach Every District (RED)/Reach Every Community (REC) Strategy Evaluation Pakistan (2014-18)
Pakistan 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Pakistan Country Office 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Public duty bearers for education at provincial and district levels, with strengthened capacity, are delivering child friendly schooling to the most disadvantaged children.

description.narrative: Capacity building benefited over 24,000 (58 per cent women) education staff from schools, ALPs and district government. UNICEF direct support to ALP and ECE scale-up provided learning opportunities to nearly 26,000 children and adolescents (46 per cent girls) in 559 ALPs, and an estimated 38,000 children in ECE classes. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2017

title.narrative: Number of Alternative Learning Programmes and Social Cohesion initiatives piloted.
Number of children enrolled in ECE centres through Katchi Approach
Number of institutions benefitting from CPD opportunities for improved skills in inclusive and equitable education for marginalized children
Percentage increase in children benefitting and participating in ALPs programs
Number of education stakeholders trained on improving quality of learning and teaching at various levels
